data.name: Punisher
data.description: A vicious blaster who deals high piercing damage to multiple targets.

starItems.name: Punisher
starItems.description: A vicious blaster who deals high piercing damage to multiple targets.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to secondary targets

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies

7.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. Attack all adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

1.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

2.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

3.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

4.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

5.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

6.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

1.description: <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage instead.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets
<color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.

<color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage instead.
<color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
2.nextUpgrade:
If at least one ally is a <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

3.description:
If at least one ally is a <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.

<color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage instead.
<color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
3.nextUpgrade:
If Daredevil is an ally, when an enemy attacks him, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets

4.description:
If at least one ally is a <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally.

If Daredevil is an ally, when an enemy attacks him, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.

<color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage instead.
<color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
4.nextUpgrade:
If Daredevil is an ally, when an enemy attacks him, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Damage
Chance to assist on non-attack abilities if at least one ally is a <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> increases by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
Chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally increases by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

5.description:
If at least one ally is a <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities. Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally.

If Daredevil is an ally, when an enemy attacks him, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.

<color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage instead.
<color=#fff568>CITY HERO</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
